attributes.action: recognise that the franchise system on the railways is an unmitigated disaster and a result of badly thought out legislation. We call on you to stop the current franchise situation so that when the current franchises come to an end they are not put out again for tender but are taken back into public ownership.  This would also stop the anomally where the taxpayer is subsidising profitable organisations, South West trains is a good example of this.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The benefit of this is that it would effectively put the operation of the railway back into public ownership at no cost to the taxpayer. It would also do what is currently not happening which is to put public service before private profit
